channel.title: HTTPS auf Nicky Reinert
channel.description: Blog & projects by Nicky Reinert (Institute for Digital Challenges): web development & software development, SEO & analytics, hosting & DevOps, WordPress & Hugo, tools & projects, data protection & digital culture — plus content on AI and autism & society.

item.title: Monitor SSL Traffic On Android
item.description: Fantastic Preface Monitoring SSL Traffic of Android Apps is quite a challenge these days. While it’s an important way to understand how Apps work, find security flaws or possible data breaches, a weak encrypted traffic also is a potential security risk.
